dcterms:creator: P. J. Wolfram
T. D. Ringler
M. E. Maltrud
D. W. Jacobsen
M. R. Petersen
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 100 simulations of salinity, temperature, zonal velocity, and meridional velocity at the ocean surface of an idealized baroclinic wind-driven ocean model, obtained by running the Simulating Ocean Mesoscale Activity (SOMA) test case within a circular basin.
dcterms:title: Simulating Ocean Mesoscale Activity (SOMA) test case

dcterms:creator: L. Cheng
K. E. Trenberth
J. Fasullo
T. Boyer
J. Abraham
J. Zhu
dcterms:description: Estimates of ocean heat content from 1960 to 2015, providing insights into the changes in ocean heat storage over time.
dcterms:title: Ocean heat content estimates

dcterms:creator: Y. Gou
T. Zhang
J. Liu
L. Wei
J.-H. Cui
dcterms:description: A general deep learning framework for spatio-temporal ocean sensing data prediction, aimed at improving the accuracy of ocean data forecasts.
dcterms:title: DeepOcean framework for spatio-temporal ocean sensing data prediction

dcterms:creator: A. Colin
P. Tandeo
C. Peureux
R. Husson
N. Longépé
R. Fablet
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on rainfall pattern segmentation over oceans, utilizing convolutional neural networks to analyze and classify rainfall regimes.
dcterms:title: Rainfall pattern segmentation over oceans

dcterms:creator: P. B. Gibson
W. E. Chapman
A. Altinok
L. Delle Monache
M. J. DeFlorio
D. E. Waliser
dcterms:description: Climate model output used for training machine learning models to yield skillful and interpretable seasonal precipitation forecasts.
dcterms:title: Climate model output for seasonal precipitation forecasts
